trans-unit.source: Represents an access control entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: Representa uma entrada de controle de acesso (ACE).

trans-unit.source: The CommonAce class represents the eight most common ACE types: - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>
trans-unit.target: A classe CommonAce representa os oito tipos mais comuns de ACE:- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify information about the inheritance, inheritance propagation, and auditing conditions for the new access control entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que especificam informações sobre a herança, a propagação de herança e auditar as condições para a nova entrada de controle de acesso (ACE).

trans-unit.source: The use of the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: O uso da nova ACE.

trans-unit.source: The access mask for the ACE.
trans-unit.target: A máscara de acesso para a ACE.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> associated with the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> associado com a nova ACE.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the new ACE is a callback type ACE.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar que o novo ACE é um tipo de retorno de chamada ACE.

trans-unit.source: Opaque data associated with the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: Dados opacos associados com a nova ACE.

trans-unit.source: Opaque data is allowed only for callback ACE types.
trans-unit.target: Dados opacos só são permitidos para tipos ACE de retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The length of this array must not be greater than the return value of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*> method.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento dessa matriz não deve ser maior que o valor de retorno de <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*>método.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento, em bytes, da representação binária da atual <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this length with the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*> method before marshaling the ACL into a binary array.
trans-unit.target: Usar este comprimento com o <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*>método antes do empacotamento a ACL em uma matriz binária.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*>

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento, em bytes, da representação binária da atual <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Marshals the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: Controla o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> o objeto para o início da matriz de bytes especificada no deslocamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The byte array into which the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object is marshaled.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de bytes no qual o conteúdo de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> é realizar marshaling do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to start marshaling.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento no qual iniciar a realização de marshaling.

trans-unit.source: offset is negative or too high to allow the entire to be copied into the binaryForm array.
trans-unit.target: offseté negativa ou muito alto para permitir todo o sejam copiados para o binaryForm matriz.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum allowed length of an opaque data BLOB for callback access control entries (ACEs).
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento máximo permitido de um BLOB de dados opaco para entradas de controle de acesso (ACEs) do retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object is a callback ACE type.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar que o <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objeto é um tipo de ACE de retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The allowed length of an opaque data BLOB.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento permitido de um BLOB de dados opaco.
